docs.title: APIs
docs.text:
FastAPI ma built-in SwaggerUi swagger.io

Zde muzeme APIs vyzkouset

docs.title: Vlastni install
docs.text:
V pripade vlastni instalace na adrese :

http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs

docs.title: Zive demo
docs.text:
Nebo na zivem demu na adrese http://143.42.18.67/docs

Pro vytvareni polozek v databazi se musite autorizovat v pravo nahore emailem z obrazku Je trebe zadat admin email

Heslo je adminheslo

docs.title: Login path
docs.text:
/login/token/

Login API ma POST endpoint ktery po overeni uzivatele vygeneruje token.

Prijme username (v nasem pripade email uzivatele) a heslo, ktere nasledne overi v databazi.

docs.title: Druh pojisteni
docs.text: Admin muze vytvorit, upravit, vymazat a zobrazit druh pojisteni.

docs.title: Druh pojisteni atributy a datove typy
docs.text:
Nazev : str
Popis : str
Cena  : int

docs.title: Priklad druhu pojisteni
docs.text:
Havarijni pojisteni
Pojistuje proti havarii
1500

docs.title: Api paths druh pojisteni
docs.text:
/druh_pojisteni/vytvor/
/druh_pojisteni/pojisteni_id/
/druh_pojisteni/uprava/
/druh_pojisteni/vymazat/
/druh_pojisteni/vse/

docs.text: Admin muze vytvorit, upravit, vymazat a zobrazit pojistence.

prijmeni: str

docs.text:
jmeno="Jan",
prijmeni="Novak"
ulice="Stara 5"
mesto="Rakovnikov"
psc=125460
telefon=4589630
email="Jan@example.com"
password="silneheslo"

Nazev : str

Rozbita motorka
Tukli ho u Kauflandu
35000
5

docs.title: Pre-commit
docs.text:
Pro dokumentaci visit pre-commit.com

Pro kontrolu kodu jsem pouzil:

black
reorder_python_imports

docs.title: Pre-commit kofigurace
docs.text:
repos:
-   repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks
    rev: v2.3.0
    hooks:
    -   id: check-yaml
    -   id: end-of-file-fixer
    -   id: trailing-whitespace
-   repo: https://github.com/psf/black
    rev: 22.3.0
    hooks:
    -   id: black
-   repo: https://github.com/asottile/reorder_python_imports
    rev: v2.3.6
    hooks:
    -   id: reorder-python-imports

docs.title: Config
docs.text:
config.py

V configu mame tridu Settings, kde nastavime potrebne udaje

class Settings:

    PROJECT_NAME: str = "POJISTENI-FASTAPI-SQLMODEL"
    PROJECT_VERSION: str = "1.0.0"
    # PROJECT_KEY = os.getenv("DETA_PROJECT_KEY")

    POSTGRES_USER: str = os.getenv("POSTGRES_USER")
    POSTGRES_PASSWORD = os.getenv("POSTGRES_PASSWORD")
    POSTGRES_SERVER: str = os.getenv("POSTGRES_SERVER", "localhost")
    POSTGRES_PORT: str = os.getenv(
        "POSTGRES_PORT", 5432
    )  # default postgres port is 5432
    POSTGRES_DB: str = os.getenv("POSTGRES_DB", "tdd")
    DATABASE_URL = f"postgresql://{POSTGRES_USER}:{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@{POSTGRES_SERVER}:{POSTGRES_PORT}/{POSTGRES_DB}"

    SECRET_KEY: str = os.getenv("SECRET_KEY")
    ALGORITHM = "HS256"
    ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES = 60
    TEST_USER_EMAIL = "test@example.com"

docs.title: Hashing
docs.text:
hashing.py

Funkci pro overeni a zasiforvani hesla muzete vyzkouset v prikazovem radku

Spuste python

python

>>> from core.hashing import Hasher
>>> Hasher.get_password_hash("AhojSvete")
'$2b$12$yAysWQB8WjKO56XZXsHX9ekxIVmJTc5DFEFUZCuEm4QMmXDz8HPO6'

>>> Hasher.verify_password("AhojSvete", "$2b$12$yAysWQB8WjKO56XZXsHX9ekxIVmJTc5DFEFUZCuEm4QMmXDz8HPO6")
True

>>> Hasher.verify_password("Ahoj", "$2b$12$yAysWQB8WjKO56XZXsHX9ekxIVmJTc5DFEFUZCuEm4QMmXDz8HPO6")
False

docs.title: Security
docs.text:
security.py

Funkci generace tokenu muzete vyzkouset v prikazovem radku

Spuste python 

python


>>> from core.security import create_access_token
>>> data = {"sub":"fake@email.com"}
>>> create_access_token(data)

output:

'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJmYWtlQGVtYWlsLmNvbSIsImV4cCI6MTY3NTQzODE0NH0.qBDN_BNxIIE3sKDGf69hHP1pIa4s6_HKx1ky3b_LD1U'

docs.title: SQLite
docs.text: Vice na sqlite.org

docs.title: SQLModel
docs.text:
SQLModel je knihovna pro komunikaci s SQl databazemi v Python.

Vyvojar SQLModel je take vyvojarem FastAPI.

Vice na sqlmodel.tiangolo.com

SQLModel designed for simplicity, compatibility, and robustness.

docs.title: Zadani root password a public ssh key
SSH do serveru s pridelenou linode ip
docs.text: ssh root@123.456.789

docs.title: Nastaveni
docs.text:
$ mkdir /var/www/pojisteni
$ cd /var/www/pojisteni

docs.title: Vytvorime virtualni prostredi
docs.text:
$ virtualenv -p python3.8 venv
$ mkdir src
$ . venv/bin/activate
(venv) $ cd src

docs.title: Naklonujeme repo
docs.text: git clone https://github.com/3p1463k/pojisteni

docs.title: Konfigurace Nginx
docs.text:
Vytvorime konfiguracni soubor : 

(venv) $ sudo vim /etc/nginx/sites-available/pojisteni
do souboru ulozime nastaveni 
server{
       server_name <your-site-name>;
       location / {
           include proxy_params;
           proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8000;
       }
}
Vytvorime symbolickou linku 
(venv) $ sudo ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/pojisteni /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/

docs.title: Gunicorn test
docs.text: (venv) $ gunicorn -w 4 -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker main:app

docs.title: Deaktivujeme virtualni prostredi
docs.text:
(venv) $ deactivate
Vytvorime soubor systemd service 
$ sudo vim /etc/systemd/system/pojisteni.service
do souboru vlozime nase atributy 
[Unit]
Description=Gunicorn instance to serve Pojisteni
After=network.target

[Service]
User=<username>
Group=www-data
WorkingDirectory=/var/www/pojisteni/src
Environment="PATH=/var/www/pojisteni/venv/bin"
ExecStart=/var/www/pojisteni/venv/bin/gunicorn -w 4 -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker main:app

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
Spustime service , ktery bude bezet v pozadi 
$ sudo systemctl start pojisteni.service

docs.title: KaBOOM
docs.text: Otevreme prohizec na adrese http://143.42.18.67/

docs.title: Material for MKDocs
docs.text:
Industry standard MKDocs

Vice na squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/

docs.title: Vytvoreni virtualniho prostredi
docs.text:
Bash terminal

conda create --name pojisteni python=3.10.8

Alternativne 

virtualenv -p <path-to-3.10.8> pojisteni

docs.title: Clone repo
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/3p1463k/pojisteni.git

cd pojisteni

docs.title: Aktivace virtualniho prostredi
docs.text: conda activate pojisteni

docs.title: Install dependencies
docs.text: pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: Enviroment file
docs.text:
Aby aplikace kompletne fungovala, musime vytvorit .env file a SECRET_KEY

In bash terminal: 

echo SECRET_KEY=12345678 >> .env

docs.title: Spusteni Aplikace
docs.text:
uvicorn main:app

Aplikace vytvori nekolik uzivatelu a nekolik druhu pojisteni jako testovaci data.

Udaje k vytvorenym pojistencum jsou v adresari: 

/static/data/

Muzete se zaregistrovat, prihlasit, vytvorit pojisteni nebo udalost.

Muzete vyzkouset i admin board. Udaje k admnovi jsou v adresari: 

/static/script/

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text: Vice info na github.com/3p1463k/pojisteni

docs.title: PojistenecBase
docs.text:
class PojistenecBase(SQLModel):
"""Base model"""
jmeno: Optional[str] = Field(index=True)
prijmeni: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
ulice: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
mesto: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
psc: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
telefon: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
email: Optional[EmailStr] = Field(default=None)
hashed_password: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
is_active: Optional[bool] = Field(default=True)
is_superuser: Optional[bool] = Field(default=False)

docs.title: Pojistenec (table=True)
docs.text:
class Pojistenec(PojistenecBase, table=True):
"""Model a relationship pro vytvoreni databaze"""
id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
pojisteni: List["Pojisteni"] = Relationship(
back_populates="pojistenec",
sa_relationship_kwargs={"cascade": "delete"}
)
udalost: List["Udalost"] = Relationship(
back_populates="pojistenec",
sa_relationship_kwargs={"cascade": "delete"}
)

docs.title: PojisteniBase
docs.text:
class PojisteniBase(SQLModel):
"""Spolecne atributy"""
nazev: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
popis: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
cena: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
datum_zalozeni: Optional[date] = datetime.now().date()
pojistenec_id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, foreign_key="pojistenec.id")

docs.title: Pojisteni (table=True)
docs.text:
class Pojisteni(PojisteniBase, table=True):
id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
pojistenec: Optional["Pojistenec"] = Relationship(back_populates="pojisteni")

docs.title: UdalostBase
docs.text:
class UdalostBase(SQLModel):
"""Spolecne atributy"""
nazev: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
popis: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
skoda: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
datum_zalozeni: Optional[date] = datetime.now().date()
pojistenec_id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, foreign_key="pojistenec.id")

docs.title: Udalost (table=True )
docs.text:
class Udalost(UdalostBase, table=True):
id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
pojistenec: "Pojistenec" = Relationship(back_populates="udalost")

docs.title: VytvorPojistence
docs.text:
class VytvorPojistence(SQLModel):
"""Atributy k validaci vytvoreni  pojistence"""
jmeno: Optional[str] = Field(index=True)
prijmeni: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
ulice: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
mesto: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
psc: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
telefon: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
email: Optional[EmailStr] = Field(default=None)
password: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)

docs.title: ZobrazPojistence
docs.text:
class ZobrazPojistence(SQLModel):
"""Zobrazeni pojistence bez hesla"""
jmeno: str
prijmeni: str
ulice: str
mesto: str
psc: int
telefon: int
email: str
id: int

docs.title: UpravPojistence
docs.text:
class UpravPojistence(SQLModel):
"""Schema pro upravu pojistence"""
jmeno: Optional[str] = Field(index=True)
prijmeni: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
ulice: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
mesto: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
psc: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
telefon: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
email: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)

docs.title: VytvorPojisteni
docs.text:
class VytvorPojisteni(PojisteniBase):
"""Atributy k validaci  pojisteni"""
pass

docs.title: ZobrazPojisteni
docs.text:
class ZobrazPojisteni(Pojisteni):
"""Zobrazeni pojisteni bez duvernych udaju"""
pass

cena: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
